title: SARS-CoV-2 vaccination and uveitis: Are they linked?
summary: Uveitis is a serious ocular inflammatory condition. Vaccine-associated uveitis, while rare, has been repeatedly documented across multiple vaccine platforms, including hepatitis B and MMR.

title: A case of hyperacute postvaccinal encephalopathy after BNT162b2 nCoV-19 vaccine
summary: Seizure onset and progressive encephalopathy occurred within hours after the second dose. Imaging revealed meningeal enhancement; CSF showed mild pleocytosis—pointing to vaccine-associated neuroinflammation.
